name: root
description: AuriServe root package. Use the scripts below to install, develop, and build AuriServe.

scripts.install: cd common; npm install && cd dist; npm install && cd ../../frontend; npm install && cd ../server; npm install
scripts.dev-core: cd common; npm run dev & cd ../frontend; npm run dev & cd ../server; npm run dev
scripts.dev-plugins: cd plugin-api; npm run dev & cd ../plugin-base; npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run dev-plugins & npm run dev-core
scripts.dev-temp: cd common; npm run dev & cd ../api; npm run dev & cd ../plugins/routes; npm run dev & cd ../../server; npm run dev
scripts.build: cd common && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
